notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Kamilla N. Machado and Paulo Roberto H. Moreno carried out the experiments and analyzed the data. The antimicrobial activity was performed and assisted in laboratory of Telma M. Kaneko. The plant location and botanical identity was performed by Inês Cordeiro. The GC-MS analysis of the essential oils was carried out in Maria Cláudia M. Young laboratory and assisted by Cynthia Murakami.
